gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi

Class ABContactAPISearchSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi.ABContactAPISearchSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GWRemotable

    public class ABContactAPISearchSpec
extends Object
implements GWRemotable
    Specifies search result control parameters.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int ChunkSize
      Specifies the number of results to return.
      boolean ExcludeTotal
      Determines whether to exclude the total number of results in the search result.
      boolean GetNumResultsOnly
      If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.
      ABContactSearchSortColumn[] SortColumns
      Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.
      int StartRow
      Specifies the first row to return.
      ABContactSubtypeFilter SubtypeFilter
      Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.
      ABContactTagMatcher TagMatcher
      the matcher for restricting tags
      boolean WideSearch
      Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABCompany}, {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABPerson} and {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABPlace} instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

      ABContactAPISearchSpec()

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ChunkSize

        int ChunkSize
        Specifies the number of results to return.

      • ExcludeTotal

        boolean ExcludeTotal
        Determines whether to exclude the total number of results in the search result.

      • GetNumResultsOnly

        boolean GetNumResultsOnly
        If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • SortColumns

        ABContactSearchSortColumn[] SortColumns
        Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • StartRow

        int StartRow
        Specifies the first row to return.

      • SubtypeFilter

        ABContactSubtypeFilter SubtypeFilter
        Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.

      • TagMatcher

        ABContactTagMatcher TagMatcher
        the matcher for restricting tags

      • WideSearch

        boolean WideSearch
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABCompany}, {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABPerson} and {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABPlace} instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • ABContactAPISearchSpec

        ABContactAPISearchSpec()

    • Method Detail

      • setChunkSize

        void setChunkSize(int chunkSize)
        Parameters:
        chunkSize - Specifies the number of results to return.

      • setExcludeTotal

        void setExcludeTotal(boolean excludeTotal)
        Parameters:
        excludeTotal - Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.

      • setGetNumResultsOnly

        void setGetNumResultsOnly(boolean getNumResultsOnly)
        Parameters:
        getNumResultsOnly - If set to true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • setSortColumns

        void setSortColumns(ABContactSearchSortColumn[] sortColumns)
        Parameters:
        sortColumns - Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • setStartRow

        void setStartRow(int startRow)
        Parameters:
        startRow - Specifies the first row to return.

      • setSubtypeFilter

        void setSubtypeFilter(ABContactSubtypeFilter subtypeFilter)
        Parameters:
        subtypeFilter - Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.

      • setTagMatcher

        void setTagMatcher(ABContactTagMatcher tagMatcher)
        Parameters:
        tagMatcher - Specifies the tags to match. null or an empty matcher will match on any tag.

      • setWideSearch

        void setWideSearch(boolean wideSearch)
        Parameters:
        wideSearch - Whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABCompany}, {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABPerson} and {@link gw.ab.addressbook.entity.ABPlace} instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.
